author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-PRS REIT Says To Declare Maiden Dividend Of 1.5 Pence Per Share
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Prs Reit Plc:
* TO DECLARE A MAIDEN DIVIDEND OF 1.5 PENCE PER ORDINARY SHARE FOR PERIOD TO 31 DECEMBER 2017
* DIVIDEND WILL BE PAID AS AN ORDINARY UK DIVIDEND AROUND MID-MARCH 2018 TO SHAREHOLDERS ON REGISTER AS AT 16 FEBRUARY 2018
* AS AT 31 DECEMBER 2017, COMPANYâ€˜S UNAUDITED EPRA NAV AND IFRS NAV PER ORDINARY SHARE WERE 98.2 PENCE
* CO AND SIGMA PRS MANAGEMENT LTD HAS CONCLUDED ITS DISCUSSIONS WITH LENDERS TO SECURE 200 MILLION STG OF DEBT FINANCING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
